original_text: And also, she really is my sister. She is the daughter of my father. But she is not the daughter of my mother. And she became my wife.
korean_text: 또 그는 정말로 나의 이복 누이로서 내 아내가 되었음이니라

sentences.original_text: And also, she really is my sister.
She is the daughter of my father.
But she is not the daughter of my mother.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그녀는 나의 어머니의 딸이 아닙니다.
